t: If my phone has a small crack (above the screen), Can I exchange it in Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): Generally speaking - Amazon will not accept a handset in exchange if it has physical damage. The idea being that exchanged handsets are ultimately cannibalized OR sold as refurbished. Hence, the handset accepted in exchange must be in saleable or harvestable condition. Having sa...

t: Amazon copied products and rigged search results to promote its own brands, documents show | Reuters
s: October 13, 2021 - Amazon.com Inc has been repeatedly accused of knocking off products it sells on its website and of exploiting its vast trove of internal data to promote its own merchandise at the expense of other sellers. The company has denied the accusations.
